tit.e: The Three Largest Festivals in Kyoto
The Three Largest Festivals in Kyoto
The Three Largest Festivals in Kyoto

sen.j: 京都三大祭り（きょうとさんだいまつり）とは京都府京都市内で行われる3つの祭りのこと。
sen.e: The three largest festivals in Kyoto refer to the three festivals held in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The three largest festivals in Kyoto refer to the three festivals held in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The three largest festivals in Kyoto refer to the three festivals held in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Aoi Festival (May)
Aoi Festival (May)
Aoi Matsuri Festival (May)

sen.j: 賀茂御祖神社（下鴨神社）と賀茂別雷神社（上賀茂神社）で行われる祭り。
sen.e: A festival held in Kamomiya-jinja Shrine (Shimogamo-jinja Shrine) and Kamowakeikazuchi-jinja Shrine (Kamigamo-jinja Shrine).
A festival held in Kamomiya-jinja Shrine (Shimogamo-jinja Shrine) and Kamowakeikazuchi-jinja Shrine (Kamigamo-jinja Shrine).

sen.j: 八坂神社で行われる祭り。
sen.e: A festival held in Yasaka-jinja Shrine.
A festival held at Yasaka-jinja Shrine.
A festival held at Yasaka-jinja Shrine.

sen.j: 山鉾巡行や宵山が中心となっている。
sen.e: It features Yama-hoko Junko, (Float Procession) and Yoiyama (the eve of the main festival).
It features Yama-hoko Junko, (Float Procession) and Yoiyama (the eve of the main festival).

sen.j: 平安神宮で行われる祭り。
